GSD.description:
virtio-blk: Fix memory leak among suspend/resume procedure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit cd24da0db9f75ca11eaf6060f0ccb90e2f3be3b0. For more details please see the references link.
